amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-698 to state that the Secretary of Defense shall establish an innovators database within the Department of Defense. The database will focus on small business innovators that receive funds under the SBIR/SBTR program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
